definition: person who represents an organization and enhances its image/ambassador

sentences.english: Is this image fresh enough to have an effect?
sentences.chinese: 這個形象的新鮮度夠不夠產生效果？

sentences.english: The image of the woman popped into his head out of the blue.
sentences.chinese: 那個女人的形象突然出現在他的腦海裏。

sentences.english: Make a "civilized staff", maintain the company profile.
sentences.chinese: 爭當文明員工，維護好公司的形象。

sentences.english: Types existed in personage's image-building in the novels of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 明清講史小說在人物形象塑造上存在着類型化傾向。

sentences.english: Time had wiped her image from my memory.
sentences.chinese: 時間把她的形象從我的記憶中抹去了。

sentences.english: Remind FeiEr exhibition peng, to pay more attention to their image.
sentences.chinese: 展鵬提醒非兒今非昔比，要多注意自己的形象。

sentences.english: The image of youth comes from the artist's self-reflection and expression of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 少年的形象是出於作者對自我情緒的反思和表達。

sentences.english: Grasping the "Five Constructions", Promoting the "Three Services", Setting up Good Image.
sentences.chinese: 抓“五項建設”，促“三個服務”，樹良好形象。

sentences.english: Have a bright shape, lively & open, auto fans, a member of amateur racing car organization.
sentences.chinese: 形象陽光，活潑開朗，喜愛汽車，參加業餘賽車隊。

sentences.english: Rui Chenggang would appear to be the very model for such national image building.
sentences.chinese: 芮成鋼將會成爲國家形象建設的模範。

sentences.english: The sculptor figured the girl in clay.
sentences.chinese: 雕塑家用粘土塑造了這個女孩子的形象。

sentences.english: They call vividly this plate - type tool it the capture board .
sentences.chinese: 他們將這個板狀工具形象地稱之爲“捕獲板”。

sentences.english: What on earth humiliates the image of "students studying abroad"?
sentences.chinese: 到底是什麼損害了“留學生”的品牌形象？

sentences.english: Chao signed with the image of cool tricks Linfair record.
sentences.chinese: 張超以帥氣花樣的形象簽約福茂唱片。

sentences.english: This is clever visualization and art work.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個充滿智慧的形象藝術作品。

sentences.english: He successfully portrayed the image of hero in this movie.
sentences.chinese: 他在這部電影中成功地塑造了英雄形象。

definition: to model/to mold/(fig.) to create (a character, a market, an image etc)/(literature) to portray (in words)
to enter deeply into people's hearts/to have a real impact on the people (idiom)
the design of a character (in games, manga etc) (abbr. for 人物設定|人物设定)/(fig.) (a celebrity or other public figure's) image in the eyes of the public/public persona
role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]
person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
